acqinfo.p: The collection was the gift of Charles K. Alawan (donor no. 9887) and came to the library in 2009.

bioghist.p: Raad Alawan is a Dearborn, Michigan writer and television producer. He was the producer of "New beginnings: the story of the Islamic Center of America."

scopecontent.p: The Raad Alawan collection consists of DVDs of the interview and film footage used in the production of his documentary, "New beginnings: the story of the Islamic Center of America."
